content: I wanted to re-order our WG minutes in the sidebar. There should be some automatic alphabetic ordering capabilities in confluence: https://confluence.atlassian.com/doc/move-and-reorder-pages-146407727.html
But the alphabetical button doesn't appear when i reorder pages manually

Good morning Patrick, thanks for posting the reference link! The documentation you referenced is for Confluence Server 7.2 and we're currently on Confluence 6.14.2. The update will be done on Jan 30th and the feature you're looking for will be available after that.
